msItem.title: Preface
msItem.rubric: Nir formale ifir gomlu Eddu Snorra Sturlu sonar
msItem.incipit: Þrennar finnast meiningar um þad, huadann Eddu nafn hafe sem rók
msItem.explicit: epter firersógn og formala sialfs authors Eddu, er men meina sie Snorri Sturlu son epter Sæmund froda.
msItem.colophon: Edda Islandorum Anno Christi MCCXV primum conscripta per Sorronem Sturla sonium nomo phylacem

msItem.title: Table of Contents
msItem.incipit: 1. Vaulo spá tuaufollo
msItem.explicit: 31. Hindlu lióþ.

msItem.title: Glossary
msItem.rubric: Forntǫlud riettmæle ür norrænu samannteken ür ymsum sǫgum
msItem.incipit: A. äburdar madur sä sem mickid berst ä
msItem.explicit: þurd.r. hann giórdi ecke minna vr enn var

msItem.title: Glossary
msItem.rubric: Nockrrar Jslendskar glösur sem ecke eru so audskyldar epter þuy sem nü tydkast, huoiar ad finnast, opt i þeim gómlu vysum.
msItem.incipit: Vo] þad er ein glösa i þvj gamla mäle
msItem.explicit: Baugs suipt.) Er kona, þuj hün sviffter baug , edur af hendi sinum

msItem.title: Sturlunga saga (Excerpts)
Laxdæla saga (Excerpts)
msItem.incipit: Hann var lands horna madur
msItem.explicit: Bolli B. son mællti; ydur er of styre ad, leggia mig ad velle.

msItem.title: Table of Contents
msItem.incipit: Vavlospá
msItem.explicit: Hyndluljóð

msItem.title: Völuspá
msItem.incipit: Hliods bid ek allar helgar kindir męire ok minni
msItem.explicit: flygur voll yfir niþhaugur nai nu mun hón seykvass

msItem.title: Hávamál
msItem.incipit: Gattin allar aþir gange umskoþass skyli um skygnass skyli
msItem.explicit: heill sa er kvass, heill sa er kann, heilir þeir hlyddo.

msItem.title: Vafþrúðnismál
msItem.incipit: Haþ þu mer nu Frygg als mik fara tiþir
msItem.explicit: Nu ek viþ Oþinn deildak mina ord speke þu ert ęvisastur vera

msItem.title: Grímnismál
msItem.incipit: Hrauþungur kongur atti tva sono, het annar Agnar enn annar Geirrauþur
msItem.explicit: Oþinn hvarf þa, enn Agnar var þar leingi kongur siþan.

msItem.title: Skírnismál
För Skírnis
msItem.incipit: Freyr sonur Niardar hafþi setsk j Hlidskialf ok sa um heima alla
msItem.explicit: minni þotti enn siá hálf hynott

msItem.title: Hárbarðsljóð
msItem.incipit: Þor for or austurvegi ok kom at sundi eino
msItem.explicit: farþu nu þars til þik hafi allan gramir

msItem.title: Hýmiskviða
msItem.incipit: Ar waltivar veiþar námo ok sumbl samir
msItem.explicit: enn vear hverian vel skulo drekka aulþir at Egis eitt harmeitiþ

msItem.title: Lokasenna
msItem.incipit: Egir er auþro nafni het Gÿmir
msItem.explicit: þaþan ero nu kallaþir land skialftar

msItem.title: Þrymskviða
Hamarsheimt
msItem.incipit: Reiþur var þa Wingþórr er hann vaknaþi
msItem.explicit: sva kom Oþins son endur at hamri

msItem.title: Baldrs draumar
Vegtamskviða
msItem.incipit: Sem voro Esir ällar allir a þingi
msItem.explicit: er laus Loki liþur or baundom ok Ragnarauk riufendur koma

msItem.title: Alvíssmál
msItem.incipit: Bekki breiþa nu skal bruþur á meþ mier
msItem.explicit: Nu skin sunna i sali

msItem.title: Grottasöngr
msItem.incipit: Gull er kallat miolfroþa. Þar til saga sia, at Skioldur het sonur Oþins
msItem.explicit: haufom froþi senn munom hętta hafa full staþit flioþ at moldri

msItem.title: Grógaldr
msItem.rubric: Gróu galdur er hun gol syni sinom dauþ
msItem.incipit: Waki þu Groa, waki þu goþ kona
msItem.explicit: meþan þu min orþ of mant

msItem.title: Fjölsvinsmál
msItem.incipit: Wtan garþa hann sa upp um koma þursa
msItem.explicit: nu er þaþ satt at viþ slita skulom ęvi aldri saman

msItem.title: Hyndluljóð
msItem.incipit: Waki mer meyia. Waki min vina Hyndla
msItem.explicit: hann skal drekka dyrar veygar biþ ek Ottarj aull goþ duga

msItem.title: Hervarar saga og Heiðreks (Excerpts)
msItem.rubric: Fra Hialmare Hugfulla og Oddi Vidforla.
msItem.incipit: Jngi het kongur ad Upsolum
msItem.explicit: illur er domur Norma
msItem.note: Verses from the U redaction (after Verelius' 1672 edition) with a prose introduction

msItem.title: Háttatal
msItem.rubric: Samtyningur af þvi sem nytt var i einu Skälldu Fragmento

msItem.title: Háttatal
msItem.incipit: i. Ragnars Lodbrökar. Skyrr á skoglar vedri
msItem.explicit: steini studd enn stillis lof.

msItem.title: Additamenta et observationes
msItem.incipit: heimur in Edda denotare videtur certam qvandam Regionem
msItem.explicit: hrimþussar = Myth. 3.

msItem.author: Árni Böðvarsson
msItem.title: Hálfs drápa og Hálfsrekka
msItem.rubric: Hier hefr upp ęvi Halfs konungs oc recka hans
msItem.incipit: Qveþ ek hier om vapn oc veþe
msItem.explicit: fialls hlyd med Jokul Pallar Tantum
msItem.note: Poem in seven flokkar, written in 1770 by Árni Böðvarsson for sýslumaður Jón Árnason. Note in another hand on fol. 107v reads: Þessir flockar eru kvednir af Árna Bödvarssyni.

msItem.author: Jón Pálsson Maríuskáld
msItem.title: Maríulykill
msItem.rubric: Hier skrifast Mariu Likill med jmsum bragar hättum
msItem.incipit: Drottning ædsta dyr af ættum
msItem.explicit: so ad verde ender einginn. Amen

msItem.title: Háttalykill Þorsteins Magnússonar
msItem.rubric: Hätta Likill Þorsteins Magnusssonar a Hæl edur nockur rimna braga erende med þeirra nöfnumm
msItem.incipit: 1. Ferskeitt. Ferskeitt villdeg fræda lag færa af orda
msItem.explicit: þat er ej skade i neina stade.
msItem.note: Lower margins cropped resulting in some loss of text.

msItem.title: Háttalykill Jóns Guðmundssonar
msItem.incipit: 1. Ferskeitt Litars bäru læt eg her
msItem.explicit: hrelling kujllr frædinu liöst. Tantum.
msItem.note: Lower margins cropped resulting in some loss of text.

msItem.title: Háttalykill Leirulæjkar-Fúsa (Vigfús Jónsson)
msItem.rubric: Hätta Lykill kvedinn af V. J. S. a Leirulæk Æruryrri gydiu þetta fäordt
msItem.incipit: Dröttqvedid Fyrst ad mer feillum lastas flimtan
msItem.explicit: skiliannlega upp telja
msItem.note: Lower margins cropped resulting in some loss of text.

msItem.title: Háttalykill B. O. S.
msItem.rubric: Enn þä einskonar Hättalykill. B. O. S.
msItem.incipit: 1. Fyrst mier guded astar oturgiallda hrund
msItem.explicit: her ende lykell hendur
msItem.note: Lower margins cropped resulting in some loss of text.

msItem.author: Óttarr Svarti
msItem.title: Höfuðlausn
Ólafsvísur
msItem.rubric: Visur ur lifssogu Olafs helga Haralldzsonar eptir Snorra Sturlu sini
msItem.incipit: Umm fyrsta hernad Olafs i Danmerki Ottar Svarti
msItem.explicit: strángr caupscipum ángra innan borz um unnir kríngar lid veras

msItem.author: Gunnar Pálsson
msItem.title: Commentary on Höfuðlausn
msItem.incipit: Þu konungur vígrackr barst ungr vit á vengisblacki
msItem.explicit: hvad lengi þetta ord hefur framm eptir tímum brukast
msItem.note: Note in another hand on fol. 130v: Þetta er med hendi Sera Gunnars Pálssonar.

msItem.title: O christinn sala athuga
Psalm
msItem.incipit: Werked Guds
msItem.explicit: Lazarus vesæll liggia kir, lemstradur
msItem.note: Folded leaf pasted on to fol. 131r

support.note: One of the front flyleaves and the rear flyleaf are modern.
support.watermark: At least two different watermarks, one containing a mitre and another with a fence (city?).

foliation.p: Irregularly paginated with pencil on the bottom right corners. Fols. 26v-28r, 76v, 88, 96v, 108, 127v, 131 and 132v are blank.

condition.p: Tears in the margins on fols. 1, 73 and 74 have been repaired with tape. On fols. 115, 116, 120 and 121 the bottom margins were cut away with some loss of text. Fol. 132 is pasted over the blank fol. 131.

layout.note: Fols. 8v-19v, 24v-26r and 97r-107r are written in two columns. The remainder of the manuscript is written in one column (with the exception of fol. 95r, where the last stanza is written in two columns).

handNote.p: Fols. 128-130 were written by Gunnar Pálsson; other scribes unknown.

additions.p: Occasional marginalia throughout. A note concerning Háttatal is pasted on to fol. 88v: Þesse sidare (edur sidarste) partr Eddu sem margan kalla Skälldu, og synest ur odru exemplare, enn codice Wormiano. Olafs hvyta skalldz Þordarsonar tractatus de orthographia, er hier allrar miket stytter, enn mig minner þar sie.

binding.p: Bound in late 19th century marbled boards. Spine bound with strips of manuscript waste containing unidentified text; strips visible between fols. 37/38, 45/46 and 47/48.

origin.note: Fols. 1-8 and 29-76r were written during the seventeenth century. Fols 9-26r were written c. 1700. Fol. 28v was written at the beginning of the nineteenth century. Fols. 77-87, 122-127r and 132r were written during the eighteenth century. Fols. 89-96r were written at the beginning of the eighteenth century. Fols. 97-121 were written at the end of the eighteenth century. Fols. 128-130 were written during the second half of the eighteenth century. Cf. Kålund 1889, II:514-15.

provenance.note: Rask's autograph on recto of second front flyleaf.

revisionDesc.change: Created as subset of full file on handrit.is.
Introduced repository auth file. Updated repository element pointing, adding @ref and removing @key.
Inserted origDate and origPlace elements based on previous data, now removed.
Extracted pagination and page dimension data from previous version.
Extracted layout data from previous version.
Supplemented information from Kålund and Handrit catalogues.
